title: BitcoinMaxiNews
author: BitcoinMaxiNews
content: Does anyone know of such a channel? Can be a start-up with few subscribers yet...I'm looking for a channel that's Bitcoin only, and sums up the main Bitcoin news every day in a short and sweet way with commentary (English language only).The same format as Altcoin Daily basically, but for Bitcoin Maxis (no alts).I know about all the biggest channels, like Simply Bitcoin etc, of course, but none of them quite "fit the bill".Anyway, if nothing like that exists, it might be a good idea to start one...I would do it myself, but too busy and not native English speaker.Thanks!

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: BTC Sessions (https://www.youtube.com/@BTCSessions/): Not necessarily news, but Bitcoin-only contentBitcoin-only podcasts:- What Bitcoin Did: https://www.youtube.com/c/WhatBitcoinDidPodcast- Tales from the Crypt (TFTC): https://www.youtube.com/@TFTCBigger list: https://bitcoin-only.com/podcastsI really have nothing to suggest with Bitcoin-only up-to-date news.

comments.author: BitcoinMaxiNews
comments.created_time: March 14, 2023, 10:13:46 AMLast edit: March 14, 2023, 02:38:40 PM by BitcoinMaxiNews
comments.body: Yea, I know about those already, but thanks Been looking all over for a simple 5-10-minute Daily Bitcoin News YT channel...If done right, anyone who starts such a channel will probably attract tons of subscribers quickly.I aim replace the main headline on my website bitcoinmaxinews.com with such a Daily Bitcoin News channel,but I guess I'll have to keep looking and planting seeds for now...

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMaxiNews on March 14, 2023, 10:13:46 AMIf done right, anyone who starts such a channel will probably attract tons of subscribers quickly.I kinda doubt it. Bitcoin in itself is pretty boring(and this is a good thing); that frequently at times there will barely be any decent news that people will be interested in. Hence why YouTubers are simply incentivized to cover the broader cryptocurrency space. Would love to see someone try though.

comments.author: BitcoinMaxiNews
comments.body: Yea, but you can cover news like banking trouble etc with Bitcoin as the frame. This makes it less boring,but I see what you mean. Something will hopefully come along...
